mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum , DIR_NUMBER , DIR_SUBJECT , DIR_PRICE ,DIR_ADDRESS ,DIR_DATE ,SAVE_DIR_MAINFILE ,DIR_READCOUNT from( select * from deal_direct order by dir_number desc)) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
